text:
AVOXI | Software Engineer and Automation Engineer | Atlanta, GA or Charleston, SC | Onsite | Full-time | https://www.avoxi.com/why-avoxi/careers/

AVOXI has been serving Contact Centers for over 15 years. This position is available in our casual office environments in either Atlanta, GA or Charleston, SC. In addition to generous compensation, medical/dental/vision insurance, quarterly bonuses, and 401K with match, we enjoy having team lunches together and semi-annually participating in week-long hackathons.

Please email jake.johnson@avoxi.com if interested
